history.proof: intros. unfold filterlim in *. apply filter_le_trans with (filtermap f F). - unfold filter_le. intros P GP. apply H0. shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : Type F, G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop H : (U -> Prop) -> Prop f : T -> U H0 : filter_le G F H1 : filter_le (filtermap f F) H P : U -> Prop GP : filtermap f F P Unable to unify "Prop" with "F (fun x : T => P (f x))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T U : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (f : T -> U), filter_le G F -> filterlim f F H -> filterlim f G H

Premises:
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
ClassicalFacts.F : forall A : Prop, ClassicalFacts.has_fixpoint A -> (A -> A) -> A
Hurkens.Generic.U : forall (U1 : Type) (El1 : U1 -> Type), (forall u : U1, (El1 u -> U1) -> U1) -> ((U1 -> U1) -> U1) -> U1 -> U1
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filterlim_comp : forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H
filter_le_trans : forall (T : Type) (F G H : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F G -> filter_le G H -> filter_le F H
filterlim_id : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim (fun x : T => x) F F
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_le_refl : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F F
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
filterlim_ext : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, (forall x : ?T, f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_ext_loc : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, ?F (fun x : ?T => f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
SetoidList.compat_op = fun (A B : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (eqB : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B -> B) => Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eqA (Morphisms.respectful eqB eqB)) f : forall A B : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> (B -> B -> Prop) -> (A -> B -> B) -> Prop Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.remove_fold_1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> A -> A, SetoidList.compat_op eq eqA f -> SetoidList.transpose eqA f -> forall (i : A) (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s -> eqA (f x (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s) i)) (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f s i)
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.remove_fold_1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> A -> A, SetoidList.compat_op eq eqA f -> SetoidList.transpose eqA f -> forall (i : A) (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> eqA (f x (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s) i)) (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold f s i)
SetoidList.transpose : forall A B : Type, (B -> B -> Prop) -> (A -> B -> B) -> Prop
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
IVT : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x < y -> f x < 0 -> 0 < f y -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
IVT_cor : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x <= y -> f x * f y <= 0 -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
N.peano_rect_succ : forall (P : N -> Type) (a : P 0%N) (f : forall n : N, P n -> P (N.succ n)) (n : N), N.peano_rect P a f (N.succ n) = f n (N.peano_rect P a f n)
proj2_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (e : {x : A | P x}), P (proj1_sig e)
continuity_opp : forall f : R -> R, continuity f -> continuity (- f)
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
opp_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => - f x : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [ |- Filter ?F]
continuity = fun f : R -> R => forall x : R, continuity_pt f x : (R -> R) -> Prop Argument scope is [Rfun_scope]
Nat.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
seq.nth = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) => fix nth (s : list T) (n : nat) {struct n} : T := match s with | Datatypes.nil => x0 | (x :: s')%list => match n with | 0%nat => x | S n' => nth s' n' end end : forall T : Type, T -> list T -> nat -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ list_scope nat_scope]
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} For sig: Argument A is implicit For exist: Argument A is implicit For sig: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope] For exist: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ _]
Radd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
OrderedRing.sor_setoid : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> RelationClasses.Equivalence req
OrderedRing.sor_setoid_Reflexive : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> RelationClasses.Reflexive req
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
RingMicromega.cltb : forall C : Type, (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> C -> C -> bool
RingMicromega.cneqb : forall C : Type, (C -> C -> bool) -> C -> C -> bool
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.fold : forall B : Type, (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> B -> B) -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> B -> B
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
RingMicromega.check_inconsistent : forall C : Type, C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> RingMicromega.NFormula C -> bool
OrderedRing.rlt_morph_Proper : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req iff)) rlt
OrderedRing.Rlt_lt_minus : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m < -> rlt rO (rminus m n)
Ring_polynom.Peq : forall C : Type, (C -> C -> bool) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> bool
OrderedRing.Rplus_lt_mono_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m p : R, rlt n m < -> rlt (rplus n p) (rplus m p)

```coq
intros.
unfold filterlim in *.
intros.
apply filter_le_trans with (filtermap f F).
- unfold filter_le. intros P GP. apply H0. apply H.
- apply filterlim_comp; assumption.
Qed.```
